org.cojen.tupl.repl

Interface DirectReplicator.Accessor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DirectReplicator.Reader, DirectReplicator.Writer, MessageReplicator.Reader, MessageReplicator.Writer, StreamReplicator.Reader, StreamReplicator.Writer
    Enclosing interface:
    DirectReplicator

    public static interface DirectReplicator.Accessor
extends Closeable
    Direct interface for accessing replication data, for a given term.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close() 
      long index()
      Returns the next log index which will be accessed.
      long term()
      Returns the fixed term being accessed.
      long termEndIndex()
      Returns the current term end index, which is Long.MAX_VALUE if unbounded.
      long termStartIndex()
      Returns the index at the start of the term.

    • Method Detail

      • term

        long term()
        Returns the fixed term being accessed.

      • termStartIndex

        long termStartIndex()
        Returns the index at the start of the term.

      • termEndIndex

        long termEndIndex()
        Returns the current term end index, which is Long.MAX_VALUE if unbounded. The end index is always permitted to retreat, but never lower than the commit index.

      • index

        long index()
        Returns the next log index which will be accessed.

      • close

        void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
        Specified by:
        close in interface Closeable
